nujudge dikkasadaya lowapura pracharaya wima, lama wiwahayan awalangu kirima sandaha purogami wu athara, ee athurin 2009 wasaredi, dolar 13,000ka mudalak sandaha saudi arabiye awurudu 53ka madiwiye minisekuta balahathkarayen wiwaha karadun 8 hawiridi gahanu lamayakuge dikkasadaya wadath prachalitha wuna. 2013 di nujud madhyayata pawasuwe prakashakayan wisin gewana lada mudalwalin wadi pramanayak thama piya wisin randawagena athi bawath, aya siya niwasen nerapa athi bawathya.
